channel.title: InnovationX - Java Vertual Machine
channel.description:
I'm trying to run my InnovationX but when I run it it like doesnt work..
What does it mean by,
Error: no 'server' JVM at 'C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/Bin/server/jvm.dll'.
It's when I run the server.. I removed MySQL
Help would be much appreciated.

item.title: InnovationX - Java Vertual Machine
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:361531”]Just copy the server jvm .dll into the JRE.

[quote]
I would add is that you can just copy the whole directory from

C:\Program Files\Java<JDK PATH>\jre\bin\server

to

C:\Program Files\Java<JRE PATH>\bin\server

assuming you are using XP. Nothing else is required.
[/quote][/quote]

The problem is that my java JRE6 file doesnt contain ‘server’

I went and looked, C:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/ then I’m ment to go find a file called server, but it’s not there.

EDIT - Nevermind, I just went to my JDK copied server/jvm.dll and put in jre6/bin

Read full topic

item.title: InnovationX - Java Vertual Machine
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Just copy the server jvm .dll into the JRE.

I would add is that you can just copy the whole directory from

C:\Program Files\Java<JDK PATH>\jre\bin\server

to

C:\Program Files\Java<JRE PATH>\bin\server

assuming you are using XP. Nothing else is required.

Read full topic

item.title: InnovationX - Java Vertual Machine
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

right click the run.bat or w/e u double click to run the server and click edit and copy and post whats in there.

Read full topic
